title: 60: The Song of Roland
dc:creator: A.J. Hanenburg
description: The Song of Roland is one of the oldest examples of French literature. It also has some of my favorite things: swords, horses, war horns and Nicolas Cage. Just kidding, there are no swords.
itunes:author: Hanenbeenaldson
itunes:subtitle: We don't sing, I promise
